title: srinivasa thava
sahitya:
shreenivaasa tava caraNeLa

cintayaami santatam

(shreenivaasa)



anupallavi



deena janaavana tureeNa shreevEnkaTagiri ramaNa

(shreenivaasa)



caraNam



kamalajaa manOhara shreekarakaruNaa jaladara nada

samaladamO bhaaskarasurEsa raamadaasanuda

(shreenivaasa)
